name: Twighlights Crypt
description:
This is my entry for the NekotoArts Summer Game Jam 2020.

My aim was to create a top down dungeon game which had super smooth and really snappy, quick and limitless combat.

Play as the Hero Knight sent to defeat the Mutant Slime that lurks within the crypt. I wish you luck! He's rather tough to beat!

This game was made for NekotoArts Summer Game Jam 2020 using this asset pack:
https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack
